Test Name: Mycobacterium tuberculosis complex (MTBC) Pyrazinamide (PZA) Susceptibility Test
Specimen Type: Fresh clinical culture of Mycobacterium tuberculosis complex (MTBC)
Purpose: To determine the susceptibility or resistance of MTBC isolates to the drug Pyrazinamide.
Container: Mycobacterium Growth Indicator Tube (MGIT) containing enriched Middlebrook 7H9 broth
Equipment: BACTEC MGIT 960 system with MGIT 960 PZA kit
